actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for the Environmental Protection Agency to relocate certain laboratory facilities from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Environmental Protection Agency to relocate the Environmental Monitoring Systems Laboratory and related facilities from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, to a consolidated facility, subject to specified conditions.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the Environmental Protection Agency to relocate certain laboratory facilities from the University of Nevada, Las Vegas, and for other purposes.
